S04n405:1: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat–kutrāhaṃ bhagavan gaccheyaṃ yatra ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyārājñīṃ labheyam?
S04n405:2: bhagavānāha–asti kulaputra vārāṇasyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ dharmabhāṇako ya imāṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ dhārayati vācayati yoniśaśca manasi kurute |
S04n405:3: āha–gamiṣyāmyahaṃ bhagavan vārāṇasīṃ mahānagarīṃ tasya dharmabhāṇakasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya |
S04n405:15: na ca kulaputra tvayā dharmabhāṇakaṃ dṛṣṭvā vicikitsācittamutpādayitavyam |
S04n405:16: mā tvaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvabhūmeścyutvā adāye prapatsyase |
S04n405:17: sa ca dharmabhāṇakaḥ śīlavipannaḥ ācaravipanno bhāryāputraduhitṛbhiḥ parivṛtaḥ kāṣāyoccāraprasrāvaparipūrṇaḥ asaṃvṛtteryāpathaḥ ||
S04n405:19: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bodhisattvo mahāsattva anekairbodhisattvaparṣadgṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitairdārakadārikādibhiḥ saṃprasthitaḥ |
S04n405:20: tasya dharmabhāṇakasya pūjākarmaṇe divyāni chatrāṇi divyāni upānahāni maulīkuṇḍalasragdāmakeyūrahārārdhahāraratnahāraskandhopariṣvajānikapṛṣṭhottaryāṇi aṅguṣṭhavibhedikāni anyāni ca vividhāni vastrāṇi cīvarādhyuṣitāni vidyādharasaṃcoditāni kāśikavastrāṇyagniśaucavastrāṇi ca anyāni ca vividhāni vastrāṇi puṣpāṇi |
S04n405:21: tadyathā–utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamāndāravamahāmāndāravāṇi mañjūṣakamahāmañjūṣakāṇi caudumbarāṇi anyāni vividhāni kāṣṭhapuṣpāṇi campakakaravīrapāṭalāni muktakavārṣikāṇi śakunakādhyuṣitāni |
S04n405:24: anyāni ca sthalajalajāni puṣpāṇi vividhāni gṛhītvā yena vārāṇasī mahānagarī tenopajagāma |
S04n405:27: upasaṃkramya pādau śirasābhivandya sa tena dṛṣṭaḥ śīlavipanna ācāravipanno'saṃvṛteryāpathaḥ |
S04n405:29: tairvastrābharaṇaiḥ gandhamālyaiśca mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā tasya dharmabhāṇakasya purastātprāñjalībhūtaḥ tadvijñamidamavocat–aho dharmanidhānāsvādako'mṛtanidhiriva saṃcaya anavagāho'si,
S04n405:30: sāgaro yathā bhājanabhūto'si sarvamānuṣyabhūteṣu eva te |
S04n405:31: tava sakāśāddharmaṃ deśayataḥ devā nāgā yakṣā gandharvā asurā garūḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyāmanuṣyāḥ sarve te saṃnipatitāḥ |
S04n405:32: tava dharmaśravaṇakāle mahāvajrasamaye dharmaparyāyaṃ nirdiśasi parimokṣayasi |
S04n405:34: puṇyavantaste sattvāḥ ye'syāṃ vārāṇasyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ vasanti,
S04n405:43: athe sa dharmabhāṇakastasyaitadavocat–mā tvaṃ kulaputra kaukṛtyamutpādayasi |
S04n405:44: kati māṣāḥ kleṣā aupabhogikāḥ saṃsārasya naimittikāḥ prajāmaṇḍalasyotpādikāḥ |
S04n405:45: ye ca kulaputrāḥ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyārājñīṃ jānante,
S04n405:46: na ca te rāgeṇa dveṣeṇa mohena saṃlipyante |
S04n405:47: yathā jāmbūnadasya suvarṇasya na sajjate malam,
S04n405:48: evameva kulaputra yasya ṣaḍakṣarī mahāvidyā kāyagatā,
S04n405:49: na tasya kāyena na rāgeṇa na dveṣeṇa na mohena saṃlipyate ||
S04n405:50: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī gāḍhaṃ pāde pariṣvajyainametadavocat–vikalendriyasya cakṣurbhūto bhava |
S04n405:56: abhedyānāṃ kuśalānāṃ pratilambha iti sarvajanāḥ kathayanti vākyaṃ madhuropacayam |
S04n405:57: evaṃ gururdadasva me ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyārājñīṃ yenāhaṃ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho bhaveyam |
S04n405:66: atha sa dharmabhāṇakastasyaitadavocat– durlabhaṃ ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyārājñyā asamavajrapadam |
S04n405:86: sarvadevagaṇāśca brahmaviṣṇumaheśvarāḥ śakraśca devānāmindraścandrādityau vāyuvaruṇādayo yamaśca dharmarājo catvāraśca mahārājānaḥ,
S04n405:88: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī tamāha–kathaṃ vayaṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyārājñīṃ labhemahi yena vayaṃ kṣipravarā bhavāmaḥ ?
S04n405:91: sāpi ca ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyārājñīṃ praṇamate kṛtāñjalipuṭā bhavantī,
S04n405:93: ida kulaputra taṇḍulavatsāraṃ mahāyānasya kiṃcidasau bahumahāyānasūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇagāthānidānetivṛttajātakavaipulyādbhutadharmopadeśakaḥ prāpyante(?)
S04n405:96: kiṃvā tu samadhyagataṃ sāramupagṛhṇanti śālinastathā sāramityanugṛhṇanti,
S04n405:97: nītvā svakīye niveśane bhāṇḍāni paripūrṇāni kṛtvā sthāpayitvā divasānurūpeṇa sūryatāpena pariśoṣayitvā musalaprahārairvibhedayanti,
S04n405:102: sarvayogānāṃ ceyaṃ ṣaḍakṣarī mahāvidyā rājñī taṇḍulamiti bhūtā draṣṭavyā |
S04n405:103: yasyāḥ kāraṇena kulaputra bodhisattvāḥ śrāvayanto bhramanti dānapāramitārthinaḥ,
S04n405:114: atha sa dharmabhāṇakaḥ saṃcintya saṃcintya vyavasthitaḥ |
S04n405:118: punaḥ sa dharmabhāṇakaḥ saṃcintayati sma–kutaḥ śabdo niścarati |
S04n405:119: tataḥ sa punarapyākāśācchabdo niścaritaḥ–dadasvārtha ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyārājñīm |
S04n405:121: atha sa dharmabhāṇaka ākāśaṃ vyavalokayati sma |
S04n405:122: yāvatpaśyati śaratkāṇḍagauravarṇaṃ jaṭāmukuṭadharaṃ sarvajñaśirasikṛtaṃ śubhapadmahastaṃ padmaśriyālaṃkṛtaṃ śarīram |
S04n405:123: sa tādṛśaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhiṇaṃ bodhisattvametadavocat–anujñātaste kulaputra avalokiteśvareṇa bodhisattvena ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyārājñīm ||
S04n405:129: iyaṃ ca samanantaradattamātreṇa ṣaḍvikāraṃ pṛthivī prakampitā |
S04n405:131: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra sūkṣmajano nāma samādhiḥ,
S04n405:139: udgṛhītamātreṇa sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhīṇā bodhisattvena tasyopādhyāyasya dakṣiṇopanāmayitumārabdhā–catvāro dvīpāḥ saptaratnaparipūrṇāḥ ||
S04n405:143: tvaṃ ca bodhisattvabhūta āryo'nāryo'si mā vaineyaśca tvaṃ kulaputra |
S04n405:147: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī tasya dharmabhāṇakasya pādau śirasā vanditvā prakrāntaḥ paripūrṇalābho labdhamanorathaḥ |
